suggestedMessage: If you could live in any fictional world for a year, where would it be and why?
What's a small act of kindness you've witnessed or experienced that made your day better?
If you could master any skill instantly, what would it be and how would you use it?
What's a quote or saying that always inspires you when you need motivation?
If you had to describe your personality using only three emojis, which ones would you choose?
What's something you thought you'd have figured out by now but totally don't?
If you could erase one embarrassing moment from your life, would you?
What's a mistake you made that actually turned out to be a good thing?
If time and money weren't an issue, what would your dream life look like?
What's a conspiracy theory you secretly think might be true?
If you could talk to your future self for five minutes, what would you ask?
What's a moment from your life that felt like a movie scene?
Would you rather always know when someone is lying or be able to lie without anyone ever noticing?
What's a risk you took that paid off?
If you had to leave everything behind and start fresh somewhere new, where would you go?
What's the weirdest compliment you've ever received?
Do you believe in soulmates? Why or why not?
If you could relive one night of your life, which one would it be?
What's a small habit you've picked up that unexpectedly changed your life?
If you could experience one moment in history firsthand, which one would you choose?
What's a topic you could talk about for hours without getting bored?
What's the most unexpected thing you've learned about yourself in the last year?
If you could be ridiculously good at one thing overnight, what would it be?
What's a song lyric that perfectly describes your current mindset?
What's a random childhood memory that still makes you laugh?
If your life had a narrator, who would you want it to be?
Would you rather be able to control time or read minds?
What's one piece of advice you wish you had listened to sooner?
If you could have dinner with three fictional characters, who would they be?
What's one thing you hope your future self never forgets?
If you had to sum up your life in a hashtag, what would it be?
What's a weird superstition you actually believe in?
What's one thing you thought only you did until you realized everyone else does it too?
If you had a personal theme song, what would it be?
What's a compliment you've never forgotten?
If you had to switch lives with someone for a month, who would it be?
Would you rather always say exactly what's on your mind or never be able to speak your thoughts?
If you could make one law that everyone had to follow, what would it be?
What's something you're really passionate about but rarely talk about?
If you could bring one trend back from the past, what would it be?
What's a childhood fear you've never outgrown?
If someone had to play you in a movie, who would you want it to be?
What's one thing you love that everyone else seems to hate?
If you had to describe your current mood using a meme, which one would it be?

Would you rather have unlimited knowledge or unlimited money?

What's a feeling you wish you could experience for the first time again?
What's a movie or book ending that still haunts you?

What's a hobby you've always wanted to try but never got around to?
If you could spend a day inside any video game, which one would it be?
What's one thing that instantly makes you feel at home?
If you could swap lives with someone for a week, would you do it? Who would it be?
What's a random thing that always makes you smile?
Would you rather live 10 years in the past or 10 years in the future?
If you had to give your life a title, what would it be?
What's something you've done that you never thought you would?
If you could visit any alternate reality, what would it look like?
